name: Verify scan details API returns 404 when scan ID is not found -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends GET request to fetch scan details for scan ID "66a3519e-8f94-43da-8be3-052ec1f57200"
When the user receives the scan details response
Then the status code returned should be 404 for not found error
And the response should contain an error message "Not Found"
And the message should contain "Scan with ID 66a3519e-8f94-43da-8be3-052ec1f57200 not found."

fullName: Get Scan Details using Genr3d API: Verify scan details API returns 404 when scan ID is not found
